title: Steel, ca. 1700–1800
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Plain steel. Brass socket chased with scrolls, twisted spiral brass handle, terminates in oval loop handle of brass, held by screw and nut.

tombstone.epitaph:
Steel, ca. 1700–1800.
ca. 1700–1800. steel, brass. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-48.
